resources.string: HaHaHa,I\'m just kidding you go to the next level and i will show you how to play

Bravo...you are now at acceptable level to compete with johnny

A simple and easy game where (two people) or (one person against the computer) can participate in the game, each player adds a number from 1 to 10 where the numbers 1 and 10 are acceptable, the winner is the one who reaches the number 100 first.
Hello everybody ,I\'m so glad because you are playing my game ,My name is Johnny Fade Keriake and this is my first project, i made this game in 1/3/2022.
